segments.text: I would like to exchange this dress .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can exchange this dress with anything of the same value .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything on sale today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . There are no sales today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are dresses going to be on sale ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything's going to be on sale next weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . I'll wait . See you next weekend .
segments.speaker: S1
